import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const contactData = (user) => { axios .post("http://127.0.0.1:8001/v1/api/contact", user) .then((res) => alert(res.data)) .catch((err) => alert(err.message)); }; export const Contact = () => { const [contact, setContact] = useState({ name: "", email: "", subject: "", message:"" }); const handleInput = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setContact({ ...contact, [name]: value }); }; const handleSign = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); contactData(contact) setContact({ name: "", email: "", subject: "", message:"" }); }; return( <> {/* ======= Contact Section ======= */}
